title: no MIR available for DefId

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code This bug occurs while compiling the latest `wasmtime-cranelift` and unfortunately I didn't have much success minimizing a 500k LOC (expanded) rust file :P Problematic commit: https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime/tree/1ef0abb12c1978a96b2dd7299390dbe204a138d7 ### Meta The error occurs on `nightly`, but not on `stable` or `beta`. Nightly: ``` rustc 1.60.0-nightly (89b9f7b28 2022-01-10) binary: rustc commit-hash: 89b9f7b284aacc5f8613438b80e4dd7bdd10549e commit-date: 2022-01-10 host: aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.60.0-nightly LLVM version: 13.0.0 ``` Beta: ``` rustc 1.58.0-beta.3 (4aa9d237c 2022-01-08) binary: rustc commit-hash: 4aa9d237c7254fc4829cfea2a27d9896b18cdbc1 commit-date: 2022-01-08 host: aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.58.0-beta.3 LLVM version: 13.0.0 ``` Stable: ``` rustc 1.57.0 (f1edd0429 2021-11-29) binary: rustc commit-hash: f1edd0429582dd29cccacaf50fd134b05593bd9c commit-date: 2021-11-29 host: aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.57.0 LLVM version: 13.0.0 ``` ### Error output ``` Compiling wasmtime-cranelift v0.33.0 (/home/indiv0/src/wasmtime/crates/cranelift) error: internal compiler error: compiler/rustc_monomorphize/src/collector.rs:966:9: no MIR available for DefId(20:1331 ~ cranelift_codegen[4ffc]::machinst::buffer::{impl#3}::get_srclocs_sorted) thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', compiler/rustc_errors/src/lib.rs:1169:9 note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` environment variable to display a backtrace note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.60.0-nightly (89b9f7b28 2022-01-10) running on aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 -C incremental --crate-type lib note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: #0 [collect_and_partition_mono_items] collect_and_partition_mono_items #1 [exported_symbols] exported_symbols end of query stack error: could not compile `wasmtime-cranelift` ```
Backtrace

``` Compiling wasmtime-cranelift v0.33.0 (/home/indiv0/src/wasmtime/crates/cranelift) error: internal compiler error: compiler/rustc_monomorphize/src/collector.rs:966:9: no MIR available for DefId(20:1331 ~ cranelift_codegen[c997]::machinst::buffer::{impl#3}::get_srclocs_sorted) thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', compiler/rustc_errors/src/lib.rs:1169:9 stack backtrace: 0: std::panicking::begin_panic:: 1: std::panic::panic_any:: 2: ::bug 3: ::bug 4: rustc_middle::ty::context::tls::with_opt::::{closure#0}, ()> 5: rustc_middle::util::bug::opt_span_bug_fmt:: 6: rustc_middle::util::bug::bug_fmt 7: rustc_monomorphize::collector::should_codegen_locally 8: rustc_monomorphize::collector::visit_instance_use 9: ::visit_terminator 10: rustc_monomorphize::collector::collect_neighbours 11: rustc_monomorphize::collector::collect_items_rec 12: rustc_monomorphize::collector::collect_items_rec 13: rustc_monomorphize::collector::collect_items_rec 14: rustc_monomorphize::collector::collect_items_rec 15: rustc_monomorphize::collector::collect_items_rec 16: ::time::<(), rustc_monomorphize::collector::collect_crate_mono_items::{closure#1}> 17: rustc_monomorphize::collector::collect_crate_mono_items 18: rustc_monomorphize::partitioning::collect_and_partition_mono_items 19: >::with_task::>, &[rustc_middle::mir::mono::CodegenUnit])> 20: rustc_data_structures::stack::ensure_sufficient_stack::<((&std::collections::hash::set::HashSet>, rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query:: 23: rustc_codegen_ssa::back::symbol_export::exported_symbols_provider_local 24: >::with_task:: 25: rustc_data_structures::stack::ensure_sufficient_stack::<(&[(rustc_middle::middle::exported_symbols::ExportedSymbol, rustc_middle::middle::exported_symbols::SymbolExportLevel)], panic: #0 [collect_and_partition_mono_items] collect_and_partition_mono_items #1 [exported_symbols] exported_symbols end of query stack error: could not compile `wasmtime-cranelift` ```
